WorkItem.ClosedComment: Your array should bemultidimensional,for columns and rozs. For example, try your code with $apps as:$apps = array(    array("Column 1, row 1", "Column 2, row 1"),    array("Column 1, row 2", "Column 2, row 2"));
WorkItem.Description:
i use fromArray() to fill my excel file with content submitted from a form, but the fromArray() function writes only the first letter of the arrays content in my excel file :-( i really don't know why... the other variables, which are not arrays, are ok
i use: $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->fromArray($apps, 10, 'G6');
between the variable and the cell is a $nullvalue, i wrote 10 therefor, i don't really understand what it is for... 
please help me.
WorkItem.Summary: fromArray() writes only the first letter of the array content from a form to excel file
